lyric:
[by:工作婊]
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Andrew Taggart/Tony Ann/Emily Warren
[00:01.000] 作词 : Andrew Taggart/Tony Ann/Emily Warren
[00:30.780] You probably think you're going to Heaven
[00:34.639] Even though you put me through Hell
[00:38.067] You're preaching like you're some kind of reverent
[00:41.727] I wish you'd turn the light on yourself
[00:43.672]
[00:44.315] You thought that if you wrecked my car
[00:47.882] Those flames would mend your broken heart
[00:51.607] I know you say it's all my fault
[00:55.233] But darling, if these walls could talk
[00:58.387]
[01:00.210] They'd say that you should put down your weapons
[01:03.802] Before you go and start up a war
[01:07.806] There's no point in getting upset here
[01:11.423] You can't tell what you're fighting for
[01:13.440]
[01:13.806] I know you're telling all your friends
[01:17.442] Those things I wish I never said
[01:21.118] I know you won't pick up my calls
[01:24.771] But darling, if these walls could talk
tlyric:
[by:Ultraillusion]
[00:30.780]你笃定死后你会飞升入天
[00:34.639]即使你亲手推我下地狱
[00:38.067]你嘴里碎碎念着看似虔诚的教徒
[00:41.727]或许亲爱的你应该亲手点亮明灯照亮周围的阴霾
[00:44.315]你认为若将我的爱车撞毁
[00:47.882]熊熊烈火会净化修补你破碎空虚的心
[00:51.607]我深知你会将责任归咎于我
[00:55.233]但亲爱的，若是墙壁能发声
[01:00.210]他们会好言相劝让你卸下武器
[01:03.802]在你欲发动一场战争的临行之前
[01:07.806]我认为在此生气毫无意义
[01:11.423]你早已忘却为何而战
[01:13.806]我知道你会告诉你所有的挚友
[01:17.442]那些我希望从未对你讲过的忠言
[01:21.118]我也心知肚明你不会再接我的电话
[01:24.771]但亲爱的，若是冷墙能发声或许你能知道我对你的爱从未消逝
